title: Full Moon Squeaky Toy
summaries: The Full Moon Squeaky Toy is a pet-summoning item which summons a Baby Werewolf pet that follows the player around. It can be purchased from the Zoologist during a Blood Moon in Hardmode, for 30. If the player goes too far away, the Baby Werewolf flies after the player by moving its arms mimicking a bird-like creature.

statistics.Buy: 30
statistics.Sell: 6
